name: Splendida helm
description: Matching helm for the Splendida, wearing it to complete the Splendida set!

name: Spore Doll
description: A doll designed liked the spore in moist areas. It permanently increases the character's M.Def by 25 points and cannot be traded.

name: Spore Hat
description: Highly recommenced hat if someone wants to become a spore monster. It will turn you into a spore once you wear it!

name: Spore Hat [1]
description: Highly recommenced hat if someone wants to become a spore monster. It will turn you into a spore once you wear it!

name: Spore Hat [1] Blueprint
description: Highly recommenced hat if someone wants to become a spore monster. It will turn you into a spore once you wear it!

name: Spring
description: The cold moon looks like a silver emblem hanging in the silentium sky. The stopped clothes function again. With a metal plate in her hand, the girl found a haven and protector from the world that pushed her out. -----------[Kafra Fairy Tale·Volume 4, Chapter 37: The Big Clock and The Girl]

name: Spring Blueprint
description: The cold moon looks like a silver emblem hanging in the silentium sky. The stopped clothes function again. With a metal plate in her hand, the girl found a haven and protector from the world that pushed her out. -----------[Kafra Fairy Tale·Volume 4, Chapter 37: The Big Clock and The Girl]

name: Spring Campus Gashapon
description: A Gashapon toy to express personal feelings, open it to randomly receive one headwear April 2018 [Spring Campus Song] series.

name: Spring Celebration Card
description: Puff! Puff! Enjoy the Goblin Kingdom celebrations!

name: Spring Celebration Giftbox
description: A small Spring Celebration gift, given with the sincere blessings of the Goblins.

name: Spring Fantasy·Flame
description: A warm and lovely beanie with a piglet on it. “ Ooink, let me brings you happiness!” This one has the passionate red.

name: Spring Fantasy·Glacier
description: A warm and lovely beanie with a piglet on it. “ Ooink, let me brings you happiness!” This one has the peaceful blue.

name: Spring Fantasy·Purple
description: A warm and lovely beanie with a piglet on it. “ Ooink, let me brings you happiness!” This one has the mysterious purple.

name: Spring Fantasy·Tea
description: A warm and lovely beanie with a piglet on it. “ Ooink, let me brings you happiness!” This one has the gentle green.

name: Spring Festival Fashion Chest
description: A string and a pillar, a dream and a past. Fortune surrounds you, telling of the divine elegance of the wearer.
